name: Lost Tomb
description:
Can you escape?

Explore the dark in this randomly generated 3D adventure. Solve puzzles, evade traps, and discover the darkness hidden in the depths of the Lost Tomb.

Controls:

W/A/S/D or Arrows - Move

Left Click / Enter / E - Interact with object

Hold Shift - Sprint

Space - Jump

Control - Toggle Crouch

Credits:

Programmer / Design: Berick Cook - @berickcook

Artist / Design: Rennyl Montuya - facebook.com/biggiantgames

Music / SFX: Damion Sheppard - thatcomposer.com - @DamionSheppard

This game was originally made in 48 hours for AsylumJam2015.
